name: Dirty Grandpa - Unrated: Daytona Heat
detailed_description: “Officer Gary Reiter” and “Officer Jane Finch” are ridiculous and ineffective cops, but are certainly entertaining as characters in a reality television series about the Daytona police department. A sneak peak at “Officer Reiter” and “Officer Finch’s” original audition tape and screen test for the very short lived reality public television series, “Daytona Heat.”
